title: Direct mapping of the solid–liquid adhesion energy with subnanometre resolution
title_cn: 亚纳米级分辨率的固液粘附能的直接映射
abstract: Solid–liquid interfaces play a fundamental role in surface electrochemistry, catalysis, wetting, self-assembly and biomolecular functions. The interfacial energy determines many of the properties of such interfaces, including the arrangement of the liquid molecules at the surface of the solid. Diffraction techniques are often used to investigate the structure of solid–liquid interfaces, but measurements of irregular or inhomogeneous interfaces remain challenging. Here, we report atomic- and molecular-resolution images of various organic and inorganic samples in liquids, obtained with a commercial atomic force microscope operated dynamically with small-amplitude modulation. This approach uses the structured liquid layers close to the solid to enhance lateral resolution. We propose a model to explain the mechanism dominating the image formation, and show that the energy dissipated during this process is related to the interfacial energy through a readily achievable calibration curve. Our topographic images and interfacial energy maps could provide insights into important interfaces.
abstract_cn: 固体的液体界面在表面电化学，催化，润湿，自组装和生物分子功能中起着基本作用。界面能决定了这种界面的许多特性，包括液体分子在固体表面的排列。衍射技术通常用于研究固液界面的结构，但是对不规则或不均匀界面的测量仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们报告了液体中各种有机和无机样品的原子和分子分辨率图像，这些图像是通过使用小幅度调制动态运行的商业原子力显微镜获得的。该方法使用靠近固体的结构化液体层来提高横向分辨率。我们提出了一个模型来解释控制图像形成的机理，并通过易于获得的校准曲线表明在此过程中耗散的能量与界面能有关。我们的地形图和界面能图可以提供重要界面的洞察力。</ p>

title: Spontaneous high-concentration dispersions and liquid crystals of graphene
title_cn: 自发性高浓度分散体和石墨烯液晶
abstract: Graphene combines unique electronic properties and surprising quantum effects with outstanding thermal and mechanical properties. Many potential applications, including electronics and nanocomposites, require that graphene be dispersed and processed in a fluid phase. Here, we show that graphite spontaneously exfoliates into single-layer graphene in chlorosulphonic acid, and dissolves at isotropic concentrations as high as ∼2 mg ml−1, which is an order of magnitude higher than previously reported values. This occurs without the need for covalent functionalization, surfactant stabilization, or sonication, which can compromise the properties of graphene or reduce flake size. We also report spontaneous formation of liquid-crystalline phases at high concentrations (∼20–30 mg ml−1). Transparent, conducting films are produced from these dispersions at 1,000Ω □−1 and ∼80% transparency. High-concentration solutions, both isotropic and liquid crystalline, could be particularly useful for making flexible electronics as well as multifunctional fibres.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯结合了独特的电子性能和令人惊讶的量子效应以及出色的热和机械性能。包括电子和纳米复合材料在内的许多潜在应用都要求石墨烯在液相中分散和加工。在这里，我们发现石墨在氯磺酸中自发剥落成单层石墨烯，并以高达2 mg ml ＆＃8722; 1 的各向同性浓度溶解，幅度高于先前报告的值。不需要共价官能化，表面活性剂稳定化或超声处理即可发生这种情况，而共价官能化处理，表面活性剂稳定处理或超声处理可能会损害石墨烯的性质或减小薄片尺寸。我们还报告了高浓度（＆＃8764; 20＆＃8211; 30 mg ml ＆＃8722; 1 ）时液晶相的自发形成。由这些分散体以1,000＆＃937;＆＃160;＆＃9633; ＆＃8722; 1 和＆＃8764; 80％的透明度产生透明的导电膜。各向同性和液晶的高浓度溶液对于制造柔性电子产品和多功能纤维特别有用。

title: Liquid glass electrodes for nanofluidics
title_cn: 纳米流体液体玻璃电极
abstract: Nanofluidic devices make use of molecular-level forces and phenomena to increase their density, speed and accuracy. However, fabrication is challenging, because dissimilar materials need to be integrated in three dimensions with nanoscale precision. Here, we report a three-dimensional nanoscale liquid glass electrode made from monolithic substrates without conductive materials by femtosecond-laser nanomachining. The electrode consists of a nanochannel terminating at a nanoscale glass tip that becomes a conductor in the presence of high electric fields through dielectric breakdown, and returns to being an insulator when this field is removed. This reversibility relies on control of nanoampere breakdown currents and extremely fast heat dissipation at nanoscale volumes. We use the nanoscale liquid glass electrode to fabricate a nano-injector that includes an electrokinetic pump, 4 µm across with 0.6 µm channels, which is capable of producing well-controlled flow rates below 1 fl s−1. The electrode can be integrated easily into other nanodevices and fluidic systems, including actuators and sensors.
abstract_cn: 纳米流体装置利用分子水平的力和现象来增加其密度，速度和准确性。然而，制造是具有挑战性的，因为不同的材料需要以纳米级精度在三个维度上集成。在这里，我们报告了由飞秒激光纳米加工技术在没有导电材料的情况下由单片基板制成的三维纳米级液态玻璃电极。电极由终止于纳米级玻璃尖端的纳米通道组成，该纳米通道在存在高电场的情况下通过电介质击穿而成为导体，并在去除该电场时恢复为绝缘体。这种可逆性依赖于纳安级击穿电流的控制和纳米级体积下极快的散热。我们使用纳米级液态玻璃电极制造了一个纳米注射器，该注射器包括一个电动泵，4 m跨过0.6 m的通道，能够产生受控良好的通道流量低于1＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 。该电极可以轻松集成到其他纳米设备和流体系统中，包括执行器和传感器。

title: DNA computing circuits using libraries of DNAzyme subunits
title_cn: 使用DNAzyme亚基文库的DNA计算电路
abstract: Biological systems that are capable of performing computational operations could be of use in bioengineering and nanomedicine, and DNA and other biomolecules have already been used as active components in biocomputational circuits. There have also been demonstrations of DNA/RNA-enzyme-based automatons, logic control of gene expression, and RNA systems for processing of intracellular information. However, for biocomputational circuits to be useful for applications it will be necessary to develop a library of computing elements, to demonstrate the modular coupling of these elements, and to demonstrate that this approach is scalable. Here, we report the construction of a DNA-based computational platform that uses a library of catalytic nucleic acids (DNAzymes), and their substrates, for the input-guided dynamic assembly of a universal set of logic gates and a half-adder/half-subtractor system. We demonstrate multilayered gate cascades, fan-out gates and parallel logic gate operations. In response to input markers, the system can regulate the controlled expression of anti-sense molecules, or aptamers, that act as inhibitors for enzymes.
abstract_cn: 能够执行计算操作的生物系统可用于生物工程和纳米医学，而DNA和其他生物分子已被用作生物计算电路中的活性成分。还已经证明了基于DNA / RNA酶的自动机，基因表达的逻辑控制以及用于处理细胞内信息的RNA系统。但是，为了使生物计算电路对应用有用，将有必要开发一个计算元件库，以证明这些元件的模块化耦合，并证明这种方法是可扩展的。在这里，我们报告基于DNA的计算平台的构建，该平台使用催化核酸（DNAzyme）及其底物的库，用于输入引导的逻辑门通用集和半加法器/半器的动态组装-减法器系统。我们演示了多层门级联，扇出门和并行逻辑门操作。该系统可以响应输入标记，调节作为酶抑制剂的反义分子或适体的受控表达。</ p>

title: Understanding amyloid aggregation by statistical analysis of atomic force microscopy images
title_cn: 通过原子力显微镜图像的统计分析了解淀粉样蛋白聚集
abstract: The aggregation of proteins is central to many aspects of daily life, including food processing, blood coagulation, eye cataract formation disease and prion-related neurodegenerative infections. However, the physical mechanisms responsible for amyloidosis—the irreversible fibril formation of various proteins that is linked to disorders such as Alzheimer's, Creutzfeldt–Jakob and Huntington's diseases—have not yet been fully elucidated. Here, we show that different stages of amyloid aggregation can be examined by performing a statistical polymer physics analysis of single-molecule atomic force microscopy images of heat-denatured β-lactoglobulin fibrils. The atomic force microscopy analysis, supported by theoretical arguments, reveals that the fibrils have a multistranded helical shape with twisted ribbon-like structures. Our results also indicate a possible general model for amyloid fibril assembly and illustrate the potential of this approach for investigating fibrillar systems.
abstract_cn: 蛋白质的聚集对于日常生活的许多方面至关重要，包括食品加工，血液凝固，眼白内障形成疾病和病毒相关的神经退行性感染。但是，导致淀粉样变性的各种蛋白质的不可逆原纤维形成的物理机制尚未得到充分阐明，这种蛋白质与诸如阿尔茨海默氏病，克雅氏病和雅各布氏病和亨廷顿氏病等疾病有关。在这里，我们表明淀粉样蛋白聚集的不同阶段可以通过对热变性的＆＃946;-乳球蛋白原纤维进行单分子原子力显微镜图像的统计高分子物理分析来检查。原子力显微镜分析得到理论依据的支持，表明原纤维具有带状扭曲带状结构的多股螺旋形。我们的结果也为淀粉样蛋白原纤维组装提供了可能的通用模型，并说明了这种方法在研究原纤维系统中的潜力。

title: Dispensing nano–pico droplets and liquid patterning by pyroelectrodynamic shooting
title_cn: 通过热电喷射分配纳米皮克液滴和液体图案
abstract: Manipulating and dispensing liquids on the micrometre- and nanoscale is important in biotechnology and combinatorial chemistry, and also for patterning inorganic, organic and biological inks. Several methods for dispensing liquids exist, but many require complicated electrodes and high-voltage circuits. Here, we show a simple way to draw attolitre liquid droplets from one or multiple sessile drops or liquid film reservoirs using a pyroelectrohydrodynamic dispenser. Local pyroelectric forces, which are activated by scanning a hot tip or an infrared laser beam over a lithium niobate substrate, draw liquid droplets from the reservoir below the substrate, and deposit them on the underside of the lithium niobate substrate. The shooting direction is altered by moving the hot tip or laser to form various patterns at different angles and locations. Our system does not require electrodes, nozzles or circuits, and is expected to have many applications in biochemical assays and various transport and mixing processes.
abstract_cn: 在生物技术和组合化学中以及在图案化无机，有机和生物油墨时，在微米和纳米级上操纵和分配液体非常重要。存在几种分配液体的方法，但是许多方法需要复杂的电极和高压电路。在这里，我们展示了一种使用热电流体动力分配器从一个或多个无固定液滴或液膜容器中提取雾滴的简单方法。局部热电势通过在铌酸锂衬底上扫描热尖端或红外激光束而激活，从衬底下方的容器中吸取液滴，并将液滴沉积在铌酸锂衬底的下侧。通过移动热尖端或激光以改变在不同角度和位置的各种图案来改变拍摄方向。我们的系统不需要电极，喷嘴或电路，并且有望在生化分析以及各种运输和混合过程中有许多应用。

title: A double-stranded DNA rotaxane
abstract: Mechanically interlocked molecules such as rotaxanes and catenanes have potential as components of molecular machinery. Rotaxanes consist of a dumb-bell-shaped molecule encircled by a macrocycle that can move unhindered along the axle, trapped by bulky stoppers. Previously, rotaxanes have been made from a variety of molecules, but not from DNA. Here, we report the design, assembly and characterization of rotaxanes in which both the dumb-bell-shaped molecule and the macrocycle are made of double-stranded DNA, and in which the axle of the dumb-bell is threaded through the macrocycle by base pairing. The assembly involves the formation of pseudorotaxanes, in which the macrocycle and the axle are locked together by hybridization. Ligation of stopper modules to the axle leads to the characteristic dumb-bell topology. When an oligonucleotide is added to release the macrocycle from the axle, the pseudorotaxanes are either converted to mechanically stable rotaxanes, or they disassemble by means of a slippage mechanism to yield a dumb-bell and a free macrocycle. Our DNA rotaxanes allow the fields of mechanically interlocked molecules and DNA nanotechnology to be combined, thus opening new possibilities for research into molecular machines and synthetic biology.
abstract_cn: 机械互锁的分子，例如轮烷和链烷具有作为分子机械成分的潜力。轮烷由一个由大环圈包围的哑铃形分子组成，大环可以不受阻碍地移动，并被笨重的塞子困住。以前，轮烷是由多种分子制成的，而不是由DNA制成的。在这里，我们报告轮烷的设计，组装和表征，其中哑铃形分子和大环都是由双链DNA制成，并且哑铃的轴通过碱基穿过大环配对。该组装涉及假轮烷的形成，其中大环和轮轴通过杂交锁定在一起。限位器模块与车轴的连接导致特有的哑铃形拓扑。当添加寡核苷酸以从轴上释放大环时，假轮烷要么转化为机械稳定的轮烷，要么通过滑动机制分解产生哑铃和自由的大环。我们的DNA轮烷能够将机械互锁的分子领域与DNA纳米技术结合起来，从而为分子机器和合成生物学的研究提供了新的可能性。</ p>

title: Advanced sorting of single-walled carbon nanotubes by nonlinear density-gradient ultracentrifugation
title_cn: 非线性密度梯度超离心法对单壁碳纳米管进行高级分选
abstract: Existing methods for growing single-walled carbon nanotubes produce samples with a range of structures and electronic properties, but many potential applications require pure nanotube samples. Density-gradient ultracentrifugation has recently emerged as a technique for sorting as-grown mixtures of single-walled nanotubes into their distinct (n,m) structural forms, but to date this approach has been limited to samples containing only a small number of nanotube structures, and has often required repeated density-gradient ultracentrifugation processing. Here, we report that the use of tailored nonlinear density gradients can significantly improve density-gradient ultracentrifugation separations. We show that highly polydisperse samples of single-walled nanotubes grown by the HiPco method are readily sorted in a single step to give fractions enriched in any of ten different (n,m) species. Furthermore, minor variants of the method allow separation of the mirror-image isomers (enantiomers) of seven (n,m) species. Optimization of this approach was aided by the development of instrumentation that spectroscopically maps nanotube contents inside undisturbed centrifuge tubes.
abstract_cn: 用于生长单壁碳纳米管的现有方法可产生具有各种结构和电子特性的样品，但是许多潜在的应用需要纯纳米管样品。密度梯度超速离心法最近作为一种将单壁纳米管生长的混合物分类为不同的（n，m）结构形式的技术而出现，但迄今为止，该方法仅限于仅包含少量纳米管结构的样品，并且经常需要重复的密度梯度超速离心处理。在这里，我们报告使用量身定制的非线性密度梯度可以显着提高密度梯度超速离心分离。我们表明，通过HiPco方法生长的单壁纳米管的高度多分散样品很容易在一个步骤中进行分选，以提供富含十种不同（n，m）物质的馏分。此外，该方法的较小变化允许分离七个（n，m）物种的镜像异构体（对映异构体）。仪器的开发帮助优化了该方法，该仪器可光谱分析未受干扰的离心管内的纳米管含量。

title: Logic implementations using a single nanoparticle–protein hybrid
title_cn: 使用单个纳米粒子与蛋白质的混合体的逻辑实现
abstract: A Set–Reset machine is the simplest logic circuit with a built-in memory. Its output is a (nonlinear) function of the input and of the state stored in the machine's memory. Here, we report a nanoscale Set–Reset machine operating at room temperature that is based on a 5-nm silicon nanoparticle attached to the inner pore of a stable circular protein. The nanoparticle–protein hybrid can also function as a balanced ternary multiplier. Conductive atomic force microscopy is used to implement the logic input and output operations, and the processing of the logic Set and Reset operations relies on the finite capacitance of the nanoparticle provided by the good electrical isolation given by the protein, thus enabling stability of the logic device states. We show that the machine can be cycled, such that in every successive cycle, the previous state in the memory is retained as the present state. The energy cost of one cycle of computation is minimized to the cost of charging this state.
abstract_cn: Set＆＃8211;重置机器是具有内置存储器的最简单的逻辑电路。其输出是输入和存储在机器内存中的状态的（非线性）函数。在这里，我们报告了一种纳米级Set＆＃8211;重置机器，该机器在室温下运行，该机器基于附着在稳定的环状蛋白质内孔上的5纳米硅纳米颗粒。纳米蛋白质杂化物也可以用作平衡的三元乘数。导电原子力显微镜用于实现逻辑输入和输出操作，并且逻辑设置和重置操作的处理依赖于蛋白质提供的良好电隔离所提供的纳米颗粒的有限电容，从而实现了逻辑的稳定性设备状态。我们证明了机器可以循环运行，这样在每个连续的循环中，内存中的先前状态将保留为当前状态。一个计算周期的能源成本被最小化为充电该状态的成本。

title: Hybrid superconductor–semiconductor devices made from self-assembled SiGe nanocrystals on silicon
title_cn: 由硅上自组装的SiGe纳米晶体制成的混合型超导体-半导体器件
abstract: The epitaxial growth of germanium on silicon leads to the self-assembly of SiGe nanocrystals by a process that allows the size, composition and position of the nanocrystals to be controlled. This level of control, combined with an inherent compatibility with silicon technology, could prove useful in nanoelectronic applications. Here, we report the confinement of holes in quantum-dot devices made by directly contacting individual SiGe nanocrystals with aluminium electrodes, and the production of hybrid superconductor–semiconductor devices, such as resonant supercurrent transistors, when the quantum dot is strongly coupled to the electrodes. Charge transport measurements on weakly coupled quantum dots reveal discrete energy spectra, with the confined hole states displaying anisotropic gyromagnetic factors and strong spin–orbit coupling with pronounced dependences on gate voltage and magnetic field.
abstract_cn: 锗在硅上的外延生长导致SiGe纳米晶体的自组装，该过程允许控制纳米晶体的尺寸，组成和位置。 这种控制水平以及与硅技术的固有兼容性相结合，可以证明在纳米电子应用中很有用。 在这里，我们报告了通过将单个SiGe纳米晶体与铝电极直接接触制成的量子点器件中的孔的局限性，以及当量子点牢固耦合到时，混合超导体半导体器件的生产，例如谐振超电流晶体管。 电极。 在弱耦合量子点上的电荷传输测量揭示了离散的能谱，受限的空穴状态显示出各向异性的旋磁因子和强自旋轨道耦合，对栅极电压和磁场的依赖性明显。

title: Tuning payload delivery in tumour cylindroids using gold nanoparticles
title_cn: 使用金纳米粒子调节肿瘤类圆环中的有效载荷传递
abstract: Nanoparticles have great potential as controllable drug delivery vehicles because of their size and modular functionality. Timing and location are important parameters when optimizing nanoparticles for delivery of chemotherapeutics. Here, we show that gold nanoparticles carrying either fluorescein or doxorubicin molecules move and localize differently in an in vitro three-dimensional model of tumour tissue, depending on whether the nanoparticles are positively or negatively charged. Fluorescence microscopy and mathematical modelling show that uptake, not diffusion, is the dominant mechanism in particle delivery. Our results indicate that positive particles may be more effective for drug delivery because they are taken up to a greater extent by proliferating cells. Negative particles, which diffuse more quickly, may perform better when delivering drugs deep into tissues. An understanding of how surface charge can control tissue penetration and drug release may overcome some of the current limitations in drug delivery.
abstract_cn: 由于其尺寸和模块化功能，纳米颗粒具有作为可控药物递送载体的巨大潜力。当优化用于递送化疗剂的纳米颗粒时，时间和位置是重要的参数。在这里，我们显示了携带荧光素或阿霉素分子的金纳米粒子在肿瘤组织的体外三维模型中移动和定位不同，具体取决于纳米粒子是带正电还是带负电。荧光显微镜和数学模型表明，吸收而不是扩散是颗粒输送的主要机制。我们的结果表明，阳性颗粒可能更有效地用于药物输送，因为它们会被增殖细胞更大程度地吸收。负向颗粒扩散得更快，将药物深层输送到组织中时可能会表现更好。了解表面电荷如何控制组织渗透和药物释放可能会克服当前药物输送方面的一些局限性。
